name: PreferencesScreen
desc: A StatefulWidget that represents the preferences screen in the application.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: SettingsScreen
desc: Screen for managing user settings such as difficulty, cooking time, portion size, and allergies.

name: SettingsScreen
desc: Constructor for SettingsScreen.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: ingredientsMapCons
desc: Map of ingredients with their corresponding constraints.

name: APICall
desc: A class for making API calls related to image processing and communication with OpenAI/Azure.

name: sendToOpenAI
desc: Sends an image URL to OpenAI for processing and returns the response.

name: uploadImageAndGetDownloadUrl
desc: Uploads an image file to Firebase Storage and returns its download URL.

name: ChatGPTRecipe
desc:
A concrete implementation of ChatGPTRecipeInterface that fetches recipe descriptions
from the OpenAI API using the GPT model.

name: ChatGPTRecipe
desc: Modify the constructor to accept user settings.

name: apiKey
desc: The API key used for authenticating requests to the OpenAI API.

name: fetchRecipe
desc: Fetches a concise recipe description formatted according to specific criteria.

name: getChatResponse
desc:
Sends a chat message to the OpenAI API and returns the API's response.
Throws an exception if the request fails or the response is not 200 OK.

name: ingredientsMap
desc: The map is used as part of a prompt to gpt.

name: userDifficulty
desc: Add fields for user settings.

name: ChatGPTRecipeInterface
desc: An abstract class defining the interface for fetching recipe descriptions.

name: fetchRecipe
desc:
Fetches a recipe description.
Returns a Future that resolves to a String containing the recipe description.

name: ChatGPTRecipeMock
desc:
A mock implementation of ChatGPTRecipeInterface for testing purposes.
Provides pre-defined recipe descriptions without making actual API calls.

name: ChatGPTRecipeMock
desc: Constructs a ChatGPTRecipeMock instance with a key apiKey, user setting paramters and a hashmap ingredientsMap.

name: apiKey
desc: The API key for demonstration purposes; not used in the mock.

name: count
desc: Counter to cycle through mock recipe descriptions.

name: description0
desc: Mock recipe descriptions.

name: fetchRecipe
desc:
Returns a mock recipe description based on the current value of count.
Simulates a delay to mimic asynchronous network request behavior.

name: incrementCounter
desc:
Increments the counter to cycle through the mock descriptions.
Resets to 0 if it exceeds the number of available descriptions.

name: ingredientsMap
desc: The map is used as part of a prompt to gpt.

name: userDifficulty
desc: Add fields for user settings.

name: Colours
desc:
Utility class to manage the colours that should be used across the application.
Below are a set of static const variables with pre-defined colour values to ensure everyone is using the same colours
across the application.

name: accent
desc: Accent colour used to emphasis an particular area of the UI.

name: backgroundOff
desc: Off background colour.

name: icon
desc: A general icon colour to display icons.

name: primary
desc: Primary colour which is generally used majority of the time e.g. background colour.

name: secondary
desc: Secondary colour which is used to highlight other areas of the UI.

name: CustomAppBar
desc: A custom AppBar widget for the app.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: preferredSize
desc: The size this widget would prefer if it were otherwise unconstrained.

name: CustomLoadingCircle
desc: Displays a circular loading indicator with animated segments

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: CustomLoadingCircleState
desc:
Manages the animation for CustomLoadingCircle, using an AnimationController
to cycle segments through disappearing and reappearing phases.

name: build
desc: Builds the widget tree, rendering the animated circular indicator.

name: dispose
desc: Disposes of the animation controller to free up resources.

name: initState
desc: Initializes the animation controller and the scales for each segment.

name: CustomDrawer
desc: Defines a custom navigation Drawer for the app.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: AuthUtil
desc: Deals with the knowledge of accessing & editing the firebase authentication database.

name: login
desc: Will sign the user into the application via firebase instance.

name: resetPassword
desc: Will send a reset password link to the user

name: signUp
desc: Will sign the user up to the application via firebase instance.

name: DataUtil
desc: Deals with the knowledge of accessing & editing the firestore database.

name: addUser
desc: Add a record of the user to the firestore database.

name: emailAlreadyTaken
desc: Checks if the email the user is signing up with is already taken or not.

name: getUserRecipes
desc: Gets all the recipes that belong to a user from the firebase store.

name: saveRecipe
desc: Saves a recipe that belongs to the user in the firebase store

name: usernameAlreadyTaken
desc: Checks if the username the user is signing up with is already taken or not.

name: DefaultFirebaseOptions
desc: Default FirebaseOptions for use with your Firebase apps.

name: DefaultFirebaseOptions
desc: Default FirebaseOptions for use with your Firebase apps.

name: ForgotPasswordPage
desc: Initialises the state for the forgot password page.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: ForgotPasswordPageState
desc: Returns a scaffold widget to display the forgot password page.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: dispose
desc: Called when the widget is no longer need to release the resources used.

name: initState
desc: Called when the widget is initialised to setup properties for the widget to function.

name: passwordReset
desc: Called when the user presses on the reset password button.

name: addGoal
desc: Adds a new health goal to the Firestore database and updates the UI.

name: build
desc: Builds the UI for the health goal screen.

name: checkedHealthGoals
desc: A map to track the checked state of each health goal.

name: fetchHealthGoals
desc: Fetches health goals from the Firestore database and updates the local list.

name: firestore
desc: Firestore instance for database operations.

name: goalsController
desc: A TextEditingController for adding new health goals.

name: healthGoals
desc: A list to hold the health goals fetched from the Firestore database.

name: initState
desc:
initializes the Health Goals page with the default health goals
and macros and calories

name: initializeHealthGoals
desc: Initializes health goals in the Firestore database if they don't exist.

name: removeGoal
desc: Removes a health goal from the Firestore database and updates the UI.

name: user
desc: The current authenticated user.

name: HealthGoalScreen
desc: A StatefulWidget that represents the health goal screen of the app.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: calorieController
desc: Controller for text field where user's can enter thier goals for calories

name: carbsController
desc: Controller for text field where user's can enter thier goals for carbohydrates

name: fatController
desc: Controller for text field where user's can enter thier goals for fats

name: fibreController
desc: Controller for text field where user's can enter thier goals for fibre

name: proteinController
desc: Controller for text field where user's can enter thier goals for protein

name: HomePage
desc:
The home page of the application that serves as the main user interface.
This page provides access to various functionalities such as viewing favorite recipes,
managing ingredients, and interacting with a food image detection system.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: ImageFetcher
desc:
A concrete implementation of ImageFetcherInterface that fetches images
from a specified API based on a text query.

name: apiKeys
desc: Corresponding API keys for each URL listed in urls.

name: counter
desc: Static counter used to determine which API URL and key to use for a request.

name: fetchImage
desc:
Fetches an image URL from an external API based on the provided query.
This method cycles through different API endpoints and keys by using a static
counter to select an index, which is used to choose the URL and key from the lists.

name: urls
desc: List of API URLs to cycle through for image fetching.

name: ImageFetcherInterface
desc: An abstract class defining the interface for fetching images related to a query.

name: fetchImage
desc:
Fetches an image URL based on the provided query.
Returns a Future that resolves to a String containing the URL of the fetched image.

name: ImageFetcherMock
desc:
A mock implementation of ImageFetcherInterface that simulates fetching images
by converting local asset images to Base64-encoded strings.

name: count
desc: Counter to cycle through mock images.

name: fetchImage
desc:
Fetches a mock image based on the provided query by selecting an asset image,
converting it to a Base64 string, and returning that string.

name: image0
desc: Asset paths for mock images.

name: imageToBase64
desc: Converts an image located at assetPath into a Base64-encoded string.

name: incrementCounter
desc:
Increments the counter to cycle through the mock images.
Resets to 0 if it exceeds the number of available images.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: Ingredients
desc: A StatefulWidget that displays and allows editing of a single ingredient with its quantity.

name: Ingredients
desc: Constructs an instance of Ingredients.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: onDelete
desc: A callback function triggered when the delete icon is tapped.

name: onEdit
desc:
A callback function that is called when the save icon is tapped.
It passes the new name and quantity of the ingredient.

name: quantity
desc: The quantity of the ingredient, defaulting to an empty string if not provided.

name: title
desc: The title of the ingredient.

name: IngredientEditing
desc: A StatefulWidget that provides a UI for viewing and managing a list of ingredients.

name: IngredientEditing
desc: Creates a new instance of IngredientEditing with the specified initial ingredient map.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: ingredientsMapCons
desc: The initial map of ingredients and their quantities.

name: IngredientEditingState
desc: The state class for IngredientEditing that manages the editing of ingredients.

name: addItemToIngredientsMap
desc: Adds a new ingredient to the top of the map, ensuring any existing entry for that ingredient is updated.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: dispose
desc: Called when this object is removed from the tree permanently.

name: editIngredient
desc: Edits an ingredient by updating its name and quantity in the map.

name: foodNames
desc: A set containing names of food items loaded from an asset file.

name: ingredientNameController
desc: Controller for the text field that allows editing the name of an ingredient.

name: ingredientQuantityController
desc: Controller for the text field that allows editing the quantity of an ingredient.

name: ingredientsMap
desc: A map holding the names and quantities of the ingredients being edited.

name: initState
desc: Called when this object is inserted into the tree.

name: loadFoodNames
desc: Loads and returns a set of food names from a JSON asset.

name: mockIngredients
desc: A mock database of ingredients, used for demonstration.

name: removeIngredient
desc: Removes an ingredient from the map.

name: searchBox
desc: Returns a search box widget that includes an autocomplete field for ingredient names and a text field for quantities.

name: validateAndAddItem
desc: Validates and adds an ingredient and its quantity to the map if the item exists in foodNames.

name: validateAndEditIngredient
desc: Validates and updates an ingredient's name and quantity if the new name exists in foodNames.

name: RecipeInitialiser
desc: Initializes a set of predefined recipes for various meal categories.

name: LoginSignupPage
desc: Initialises the state for the login & sign up page.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: screenType
desc: Whether the we are loading the login page or the sign up page.

name: LoginSignupPageState
desc: Returns a scaffold widget to display login/signup page with certain properties.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: dispose
desc: Called when the widget is no longer need to release the resources used.

name: initState
desc: Called when the widget is initialised to setup properties for the widget to function.

name: login
desc: Called when the user presses on the login button.

name: resetTextFields
desc: Resets the text fields for when changing between the login & sign up pages.

name: validateConfirmPassword
desc: Validates the provided confirm password input.

name: validateEmail
desc: Validates the provided email input.

name: validatePassword
desc: Validates the provided password input.

name: validateUsername
desc: Validates the provided username input.

name: MyApp
desc: The root widget of the application.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: main
desc: Initializes the app and Firebase, then runs the app.

name: MapToRecipeConverter
desc: A utility class for converting map data to Recipe objects and fetching recipe objects.

name: getRecipesAsObjects
desc: Fetches and converts a list of recipes for a given user ID into Recipe objects.

name: mapToRecipe
desc: Converts a map of recipe data into a Recipe object.

name: PreferencesScreen
desc: A StatefulWidget that represents the preferences screen in the application.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: SettingsScreen
desc: Screen for managing user settings such as difficulty, cooking time, portion size, and allergies.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: MockIngredients
desc: A class that simulates a database of mock ingredients.

name: getMap
desc: Retrieves the map of mock ingredients.

name: items
desc: A map representing a collection of ingredient names and their corresponding quantities.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: PreferencesScreen
desc: A StatefulWidget that represents the preferences screen in the application.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: Recipe
desc: Represents a culinary recipe with specified characteristics.

name: Recipe
desc: Creates a new Recipe instance with the provided values for each field.

name: calories
desc: The amount of calories in the recipe.

name: category
desc: The category of the recipe, which should be one of the following: Breakfast, Main, Desserts, Side-Dishes, Lunch.

name: difficulty
desc: The difficulty level of preparing the recipe, rated as an integer.

name: imageURL
desc: A URL pointing to an image of the finished dish.

name: ingredients
desc: The list of ingredients required for the recipe.

name: instructions
desc: Detailed cooking instructions for the recipe.

name: prepTime
desc: The preparation time required for the recipe.

name: recipeName
desc: The name of the recipe.

name: sortCategory
desc: Sorts and returns recipes by the specified category.

name: RecipeTemplate
desc:
A template widget that displays the data for favourited recipes or home screen recipes.
It works by injecting a Recipe object in it then rendering each part.

name: RecipeTemplate
desc: Constructs a RecipeTemplate with required recipe object.

name: build
desc: Builds and returns the main content of the Recipe, including the recipe image, title, categories, calories, prep time, difficult, ingredients and instructions.

name: recipe
desc: The object containing recipe data.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: SettingsScreen
desc: Screen for managing user settings such as difficulty, cooking time, portion size, and allergies.

name: SettingsScreen
desc: Constructor for SettingsScreen.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: ingredientsMapCons
desc: Map of ingredients with their corresponding constraints.

name: DisplayPictureScreen
desc:
A widget that displays the picture taken by the user.
Allows the user to confirm or reject & retake a photo taken.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: TakePictureScreen
desc: A screen that allows users to take a picture using a given camera.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: TakePictureScreenState
desc: The state for TakePictureScreen.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: dispose
desc: Called when this object is removed from the tree permanently.

name: initState
desc: Called when this object is inserted into the tree.

name: initialiseTakePictureScreen
desc:
A future that initialises the camera screen.
Returns the image path of the picture taken.

name: TileCirclePainter
desc:
A custom painter that draws a circle divided into multiple segments
with variable scales to create a dynamic, animated effect.

name: TileCirclePainter
desc: Constructs a TileCirclePainter with given scales for each segment.

name: paint
desc:
Paints the circle with segments on the given canvas using the size parameter.
Each segment's color and scale are determined by scales.

name: shouldRepaint
desc:
Called whenever a new instance of the custom painter delegate class is
provided to the RenderCustomPaint object, or any time that a new
CustomPaint object is created with a new instance of the custom painter
delegate class (which amounts to the same thing, because the latter is
implemented in terms of the former).

name: TinderController
desc: Controls the interaction between the model and view in the recipe app.

name: TinderController
desc: Constructs a TinderController with dependencies for model, API, and image fetching.

name: changeRecipe
desc: Changes the current recipe to a new one by removing the current and fetching a new recipe.

name: createView
desc: Creates and returns a new TinderView configured with callbacks for changing recipes.

name: extractFirstLineFromString
desc: Extracts and returns the first line from a given string text.

name: fetchRecipes
desc: Fetches a new recipe and its corresponding image, then updates the model.

name: gptApiClient
desc: Client to interact with a recipe-fetching API.

name: imageFetcherClient
desc: Client to fetch images based on recipe descriptions.

name: initRecipes
desc: Initializes the app's recipes by fetching descriptions and images asynchronously.

name: initialize
desc: Initializes the model by fetching initial set of recipes.

name: model
desc: The model representing the state and data of the app.

name: onModelUpdated
desc: Callback to update the view when the model changes.

name: recipeOverview
desc: Object which handles operations for full recipe generation

name: refreshView
desc: Triggers the view to refresh by calling onModelUpdated.

name: threadCount
desc: Number of recipes to fetch in parallel.

name: TinderModel
desc:
Manages the data for the recipe app, including recipe descriptions and image URLs.
Notifies listeners when changes occur to allow UI updates.

name: addRecipe
desc:
Adds a recipe's description and image URL to the model. Notifies listeners on change.
Throws a FormatException if either the description or image URL is empty.

name: getRecipeDescription
desc:
Returns the description of the first recipe in the queue.
Returns an empty string if no descriptions are available.

name: getRecipeImage
desc:
Returns the image URL of the first recipe in the queue.
Returns an empty string if no images are available.

name: getSecondRecipeImage
desc:
Returns the image URL of the second recipe in the queue.
Returns an empty string if no images are available.

name: hasData
desc:
Checks if there are any recipes (both descriptions and images) available in the model.
Returns true if there is at least one recipe description and image URL.

name: removeCurrentRecipe
desc:
Removes the current (first) recipe from the model, both description and image URL.
Does nothing if no recipes are available.

name: TinderPage
desc:
A widget that serves as the entry point for the Tinder-like recipe selection feature.
It initializes the model, controller, and mock API clients, then builds the UI based on the model's state.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: TinderView
desc:
A widget that displays a Tinder-like swipe view for recipes.
It shows a loading screen until the data is available and then displays the recipe content.

name: TinderView
desc: Constructs a TinderView with required model and onChangeRecipe callback and recipeOverview object.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: model
desc: The model containing recipe data.

name: onChangeRecipe
desc: Callback function to invoke when the recipe should be changed.

name: recipeOverview
desc: Object which handles operations for full recipe generation

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: buildContent
desc: Builds and returns the main content of the TinderView, including the recipe image and description.

name: buildLoadingScreen
desc: Builds and returns the loading screen widget.

name: dispose
desc: Called when this object is removed from the tree permanently.

name: initState
desc: Called when this object is inserted into the tree.

name: isLoading
desc: Tracks if the view is currently loading data.
